justification: Misreads Team B’s needs and preferences: B’s RB room isn’t weak and B values stable vets over an injured committee RB and a mid-variance WR. A already has a Tier 1 TE, so calling Marcus Garcia (Tier 4, Q) an upgrade is incoherent. Rationale is generic and contradicts roster facts. Acceptance probability is overstated given B’s conservative, win-now profile.
